abstract: time travelers and the death of the nfl .
article: my end-of-week morning train reads : i am a time traveler from the future , here to beg you to stop what you are doing amazon is so good at keeping prices low , it 's changed how economists think about inflation are stocks too expensive ?

robots will destroy our jobs -- and we 're not ready for it but see so long as there are wants and needs , there will be jobs how hedge funds hurt puerto rico the nfl is dying ; here 's why electricity prices plummet as gas , wind gain traction and demand stalls scientists just discovered the mother lode of pterosaur eggs , and they are over the moon where macy 's came from ; see also why these retailers had shorter lines this black friday the tree that rocked the music industry be sure to check out our masters in business interview this weekend with jeremy schwartz , director of research at wisdomtree investments .
schwartz was professor jeremy siegel 's head research assistant and helped with the research and the writing of `` stocks for the long run . '' discussing new record highs for u. s. stocks .
